name: KawaiiCraft
description:
Kawaii Craft brings sandbox mining crafting game in amusing kawaii colors to create your dream candy world. Bring your creative energy to a modern level of structures creation, collect creatures and utilize kawaii skins for mining craft. Start building your friends, houses, food, shopping centers and appear charming in the world of kawaii to make new constructions.

Kawaii Craft features:

- Awesome creative game that brings amusement to play
- Cool new design: main kawaii illustrations with high FPS
- Kawaii world can create Resource Packs for Minicraft
- KawaiiCraft mode, KawaiiWorld mode, MineCraft Pocket Edition mode
- Play with your friends in multiplayer online mode
- Make magnificent and charming buildings

Start making buildings with your amazing creativity in this pocket edition of kawaii world to create 3d shapes and things: rooms, houses, buildings and much more. With this craft game you can alter the thought of cubic sandboxes pixel blocks with the open will of your creative energy to exemplify any thoughts and inventive structures! Build your houses, shopping, cafes, hairdresser, stores and more. Start the amusement and begin making your world from different wonderful 3d shapes, arranged things and much more.

This KawaiiCraft for both girls and boys, woman and man as well. Most kawaii skins are for looking pretty. Mine craft and make things within the Kawaiiworld to create your perfect dream island!
